meanings.definition: A type of fiber obtained from the leaves of the fique plant.
meanings.sent1: The artisan used fique to weave a beautiful rug.
meanings.sent2: The fique fiber is known for its durability and strength.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with a ball of fique, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a fique, intertwining ideas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The fique material added a unique texture to the artwork.

meanings.definition: To remain in a certain state or condition.
meanings.sent1: Please fique here while I go get help.
meanings.sent2: I will fique by your side no matter what happens.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream fique in the freezer melted overnight.
meanings.sent4: His words fique in my mind, echoing their impact.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her smile fique with me, brightening my day.
